General.Name: Suzhou Shihua New Material Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Suzhou Shihua New Material Technology Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells functional materials in China. The company offers electronic composite functional materials, display module materials, and adhesives. Its products are used in the consumer electronics, automotive, medical electronics, and other industries. Suzhou Shihua New Material Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

1.Name: Mr. Jun  Gao
1.Title: Deputy GM, CFO & Sec. of the Board
